review: This thing is awesome.  I got it to replace my Roku 3 and it is so much faster.  Plus I love the addition of screensavers to help protect my plasma tv screen.  It is very fast and being able to add my Netflix and HuluPlus pleased me to no end.  I love this little thing!  So thankful that Amazon even included the adapter because without it I would not have been able to use it.  Well Done!
